summary: Vulnerability in the Oracle Database Server product of Oracle Database (component: Core RDBMS). Supported versions that are affected are 19.3-19.23, 21.5-21.14 and 23.2-23.4. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session privilege with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Oracle Database Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Oracle Database Server.
details: Vulnerability in the Oracle Database Server product of Oracle Database (component: Core RDBMS). Supported versions that are affected are 19.3-19.23, 21.5-21.14 and 23.2-23.4. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session privilege with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Oracle Database Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Oracle Database Server.

summary: Vulnerability in the Oracle Database Server product of Oracle Database (component: Core RDBMS). Supported versions that are affected are 19.3-19.23, 21.5-21.14 and 23.2-23.4. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker having Create Session privilege with network access via Oracle Net to compromise Oracle Database Server. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Database Server accessible data.
